rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports action factually ('health officials would provide short-term medical care') without high-potency framing.
Neutral language used; no moderate verb paired with scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports provision of medical care but lacks explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used with scale contrast.
The segment discusses fear of attention but contains no bare negation.
